I agonized about selecting a dress for the wedding. Unfortunately the pretty picture was just that, a picture. Literally ruined a special day. It took 4 hours to steam out the wrinkles. While steaming the wrinkles, discovered a line of dirty black spots on the sides and back of the skirt. Several places where the bobbin thread was in a tangle with the top thread. Spent two hours untangling & securing, clipping loose threads. Fabric is not a clean ivory, it has a dingy yellow cast. The fabric feels line rubber gloves. The bodice pulls like it was cut off grain. The black (zipper should have been white); zipper was turned in a manner that makes it bulky,and since it is black, it shows thru the skirt. As it can be seen in the pictures, the hem was not eased in, it is clumping, the black bias tape end is to long, and bunched up and has a poor seam match up. I really expected a quality product, not what I received, I am not happy at all. Spent hours racing around to select a replacement when the wedding was the next day.  .

评论概述: Flattering and Easy-Care: Bbonlinedress Women's Vintage Floral Lace Cocktail Dress Review
评论详情: The Bbonlinedress Women's 50s Vintage Floral Lace Retro Rockabilly Sleeveless Round Neck Cocktail dress offers a form-fitting silhouette with excellent stretch, conforming comfortably to the body. The fabric quality feels substantial and durable, enhancing its overall appeal.  Maintaining this dress is straightforward; it cleans easily in the washer on a delicate cycle, and air drying on a hanger or drying rack preserves its shape and quality. This simplicity in care is a practical advantage for busy lifestyles.  One consideration for those familiar with retro-style dresses is the need for a separate petticoat to achieve the desired fullness in the skirt. This additional accessory is common in this style of dress and complements its vintage aesthetic.  In conclusion, the Bbonlinedress Women's Vintage Floral Lace Retro Rockabilly Sleeveless Cocktail dress combines flattering fit, quality fabric, and ease of maintenance. It's a suitable choice for anyone seeking a stylish retro look with minimal hassle in care.
